name: Node.js
description: I recently started working on a project using Node.js and it's been such a smooth experience. The ability to use JavaScript on the backend as well as the frontend is a huge plus.

name: MySQL
description: I switched to MySQL from another database system and I couldn't be happier. The performance is great and the community support is fantastic.

name: MVC
description: I'm new to MVC and it's been a bit of a learning curve, but once I got the hang of it, I can see how powerful it is for structuring my code.
